org.apache.tephra.persist

Class HDFSTransactionLog

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.tephra.persist.AbstractTransactionLog
      • org.apache.tephra.persist.HDFSTransactionLog
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TransactionLog

    public class HDFSTransactionLog
extends AbstractTransactionLog
    Allows reading from and writing to a transaction write-ahead log stored in HDFS.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class org.apache.tephra.persist.AbstractTransactionLog

      Creates a new HDFS-backed write-ahead log for storing transaction state.

                  org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configuration hConf,
                  org.apache.hadoop.fs.Path logPath,
                  long timestamp,
                  MetricsCollector metricsCollector)
        Creates a new HDFS-backed write-ahead log for storing transaction state.
        Parameters:
        fs - Open FileSystem instance for opening log files in HDFS.
        hConf - HDFS cluster configuration.
        logPath - Path to the log file.
